resources.string: The monument is a stone stele about 2.5 meters high, mounted on a stone pedestal. On the front side, in the middle - a five-pointed star. A little lower is a plate with the inscription: "They were torn by metal, and the explosions strangled them and could not save the hospital. Here the heroes completed the military path, keep the soldiers, dear land ...". On the plates around the stele are the names of 236 people who died from wounds in a mobile field hospital.

This memorial sign depicts the list of those who died from wounds in a mobile field hospital No. 96, 14 of the army of the Karelian Front. During the war years, the hospital was not far from passing front roads, because there was a need to take seriously wounded soldiers to the rear. When the war ended, construction of new roads began. And the old ones remained abandoned. There was a need to move cemeteries to new roads. But it was very difficult to do. Therefore, only names and lists were transferred, and the bodies remained in the ground.
ON SIGHTSEEING \ nPECCHENG DISTRICT \ n MURMAN REGION
Please Install google play services to use this application
